pages.spotlightText: 一種常見的燃料，用來為你的反應堆提供動力。黃鈾礦生成在幾乎所有的生態域中，且可以拿來冶煉成黃鈾錠。
Only found in the extreme recesses of hell, Benitoite crystals has some unusual properties that you still haven't found an use for.
You need to reach the end of your journey to find this elusive crystals, even if you still don't know how you could use them to your advantage.
